pullrequest.title: Generate a single polyline walkway path collision

content.raw: Also, having a large trimesh may lead to a large bounding box, which reduces the effectiveness of broadphase collision pruning. I'm inclined to lean towards pull request #97, though I am amazed by how quickly you generated this.
content.html: Also, having a large trimesh may lead to a large bounding box, which reduces the effectiveness of broadphase collision pruning. I'm inclined to lean towards pull request #97, though I am amazed by how quickly you generated this.
